title: Christmas

banner_image.name: Padre_Christmas_937x400
banner_image.alt: Padre: artwork with gold and teal background with holly and leaves and text that reads The Most Wonderful Time of the Year

description:
It's the most wonderful time of the year! Spend the holidays at The Padre with dinner specials and buffets.

Christmas Day Buffet
$39/adults, $15 children 12 & under
10am-4pm in Belvedere Room
Reservations Recommended

Christmas Eve & Christmas Day dinner dining specials will also be available
short_description: It's the most wonderful time of the year! Spend the holidays at The Padre with holiday dining specials and buffets.
